parts.questionText: Sketch the graph of $y=3^{-x}$ on the axes below. Indicate clearly the coordinates of the points where the graph crosses the axes.

questions.stem: The diagram below shows a triangle ABC.

parts.questionText: Construct the perpendicular bisector of AC.
Construct the bisector of angle BCA.

questions.stem: A liquid container, 30 cm tall, can be modelled by a frustrum, A, placed below a cylinder B, as shown in Figure 1. Figure 2 shows a sketch of the cone that the frustum A is a part of. The diameter QRS of the top of the frustrum, is 12 cm and the diameter VUT of the bottom is 8 cm. The height of the frustrum, RU is 9 cm. R and U are the midpoints of QS and VT respectively.
questions.diagramDescription: Figure 1 shows a liquid container, 30 cm tall, composed of a frustum (A, height 9 cm) below a cylinder (B). Figure 2 shows the frustum A as part of a larger cone with height 9 cm for the frustum and diameters 12 cm (top) and 8 cm (bottom), with the dashed lines completing the cone to a vertex W.

parts.questionText: Calculate the volume of the frustrum, A.

A liquid is poured into the container at a constant rate of $q~cm^{3}$ per second. It takes 50 seconds to fill up A completely and it takes another 30 seconds to fill up B completely. Sketch the height of the liquid in the container with respect to time.

questions.stem: The variables x and y are connected by the equation $y=2x+\frac{6}{x}-7$. Some corresponding values of x and y are given in the table below.
questions.diagramDescription: Table of values for $y=2x+\frac{6}{x}-7$: x values are 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7. Corresponding y values are 6, 1, 0, a, 1, 2.5, 4.2, 6, 7.9. A grid for drawing the graph of $y=2x+\frac{6}{x}-7$ for $0.5\le x\le7$ is provided.

parts.questionText: On the grid, draw the graph of $y=2x+\frac{6}{x}-7$ for $0.5\le x\le7$.
The point A has coordinates (3,-1). A tangent to the curve can be drawn so that the tangent passes through A. On the same grid draw this tangent.
Find the equation of this tangent.
By drawing a suitable straight line on your graph, explain why the equation $3x^{2}-8x+6=0$ has no solution for $0.5\le x\le7$.
